specialTipSize.specialTip: When the employee # 0 who has worked on F-01-57 completed the work, the Qliphoth counter is decreased. Then the employee was eaten by $0.

When the F-01-57 entered the hallway of the $0' s containment room, the Qliphoth counter became zero.
